Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Gyros

Class Pigeon2Gyro

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Gyros.Pigeon2Gyro
All Implemented Interfaces:
GyroIO
public class Pigeon2Gyro extends Object implements GyroIO
Represents a Pigeon2 gyro sensor, providing methods to interact with the gyro hardware. It can load its configuration from a file, apply settings, and handle faults.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface BobcatLib.Hardware.Gyros.GyroIO

  • Constructor Details

    • Pigeon2Gyro

      public Pigeon2Gyro(CANDeviceDetails details, boolean enableGyro)
      Constructs a Pigeon2Gyro instance with the specified CAN device details and enables the gyro.
      Parameters:
      details - The details of the CAN device, including the device number and CAN bus.
      enableGyro - Whether to enable the gyro functionality.

    • Pigeon2Gyro

      public Pigeon2Gyro()
      Default constructor that loads the gyro configuration from a file and applies the configuration.

  • Method Details

    • configGyro

      public void configGyro()
      Configures the gyro sensor by applying a Pigeon2 configuration, resetting it, and setting the yaw to zero.

    • loadConfigurationFromFile

      public GyroJson loadConfigurationFromFile()
      Loads the gyro configuration from a JSON file stored in the robot's deploy directory.
      Returns:
      The loaded GyroJson object containing the gyro configuration.

    • periodic

      public void periodic()
      Periodic method to be called during each cycle, can be extended to implement periodic updates.
      Specified by:

    • updateInputs

      public void updateInputs(GyroIO.GyroIOInputs inputs)
      Updates the gyro inputs based on the current gyro data.
      Specified by:
      updateInputs in interface GyroIO
      Parameters:
      inputs - The inputs to be updated with the current yaw and fault status.

    • setRoll

      public void setRoll(double roll)
      Sets the roll value of the gyro sensor. Currently, this method is a placeholder and does not modify the roll value.
      Specified by:
      setRoll in interface GyroIO
      Parameters:
      roll - The roll value to set, in degrees.

    • setPitch

    • getTimeDiff

      public double getTimeDiff()
      Gets the time difference since the last update.
      Specified by:
      getTimeDiff in interface GyroIO
      Returns:
      The time difference, currently returning a fixed value of 1.0 second.
